channel.title: Axoloti not recognizing Runtime in Windows 10?
channel.description: I installed Axoloti, Runtime and Java according to the instructions but Axoloti can't find Runtime in the Program Files (x86) even though I see it there. I tried turning off Defender but that didn't work. Even tried re-installing. Any ideas? Many thanks!

item.title: Axoloti not recognizing Runtime in Windows 10?
item.dc:creator: @shikawkee Ed Pettersen
item.description:
@shikawkee wrote:

Update: Voila! I figured it out and maybe this may be helpful to other Windows users-

When you unzip it's not the outer axoloti_windows_runtime 1.02... or whatever you deposit in (x86). It's the folder within it.
That does the trick. You have to have the exact file name listed in the instructions for it to work.

Read full topic
item.source: Axoloti not recognizing Runtime in Windows 10?
